thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Trudi

author: Trudi
title: Trudi
text:
Can't fault the customer service and turnaround on my banners I ordered. The simple graphics work I required was also done professionally, efficiently and with only 1 or 2 revisions max. They even changed the Velcro adhesives to eyelets when the Velcro didn't really work with my fabric gazebo (don't get Velcro if you're going to have it in the sun and the other side isn't a hard surface....)
Only problem I had was with shipping when they didn't put any address on the label and I had to play chase-the-parcel with Star Track. But would definitely recommend Easy Signs. Products look really good!
